title: fbs
body:
my fbs befor the update was from 140 to 240 now after the 2017 patch the fbs goes from 50 to 16 i don't know what is wrong ! 

can someone help pls !! 

thank u

replies.body:
If you're running Windows 10 and your computer ran updates last night (like mine did), then it's likely that the *Windows Game Bar* was re-enabled by the updates. I'd recommend [disabling this feature](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html), as it has been causing FPS issues and crashes for some players since it was first deployed.

Let me know if this helped.
